column1: Mechanical Junior Engineer, Head of Electrical
column2: Role & responsibilities   - Mechanical Engineer Skilled Junior Mechanical Engineer to join our team for a hydropower project with in-depth knowledge in operation & maintenance and hydro-project engineering principles Previous experience working in a mechanical maintenance role, preferably in the power generation or hydroelectric industry. Maintain accurate records of equipment maintenance and repairs. Knowledge in reading technical drawings and manuals. Assist in the installation, maintenance, and repair of mechanical equipment such as turbines, generators, pumps, and valves. Conduct routine inspections to ensure equipment is operating efficiently and safely. Good communication skills in English - Head of Electrical Engineer Electrical Engineer to join our team for a hydropower project with in-depth knowledge in electrical engineering principles, panel design, and a strong understanding of renewable energy technologies. Proven experience in electrical engineering, preferably in the hydropower or in renewable energy sector. Strong knowledge of electrical system design principles, including power generation, transmission, and distribution. Proficiency in panel design, including familiarity with electrical panels, switchgear, relays, and control systems. Understanding of renewable energy technologies. Good communication skills in English and project management skills.

Role & responsibilities     1. Knowledge of FGD construction procedures, materials, processes and equipment. 2. Knowledge of FGD technologies and an ability to interpret technical drawings, quality plan etc. 3. Knowledge of Integrated Project Management system, coordination with Vendors, Suppliers, Subcontractors and other agencies at work place 4. Project Execution, Monitoring, Site Management,  Planning & Scheduling, measurement , billing ,preparation of L3 level recovery plan, three months rolling plan. 5. Generating MIS and exception report to higher management.  6. Planning & Execution of Resources (Man, Material & Money). 7. Knowledge of safety practices, statutory rules and regulations, labour law and interaction with local authority. Maintain and update SOW and preconstruction documents, and meet contract obligations by developing relationships with reliable contractors and vendors  Preferred candidate profile   BE/B.   Tech(Mech) : 10  12 year of work experience   OR Diploma(Mech)  : 12   ??14  years of work experience
column11: Thermal Power Plant, FGD, Power Projects, Mechanical Engineering, Flue Gas Desulfurization systems, Power Plant
